definition: military actions designed to influence the perceptions and attitudes of individuals, groups, and foreign governments

positive_examples: This is an example of psychological operation.
The psychological operation demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed psychological operation in this context.
A typical case of psychological operation would involve these features.
The concept of psychological operation applies here.
An operation designed to influence the emotions, motives, reasoning, or behavior of target audiences through psychological means.
negative_examples: This is an example of c t intelligence operation, not psychological operation.
This represents offensive information operation in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: CTIntelligenceOperation, or other types of OffensiveInformationOperation
